attributes.text: Make the player spin and stuff
The Reset Scene behavior kills the background music, so I need to use change scene instead
Change Scene to the current scene -- check which level first
Let the game know when the player is on a ladder
Player states: 0 - on the ground 1 - climbing 2 - flying 3 - jumping 4 - falling
Change Attribute: stop the player from moving left and right
Fuel runs out slightly faster on web
